section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by temporary legislation that will expire on July 10, 2024. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Immunization standards; list of immunizations.
section.text: The Mayor shall, by regulations, specify the immunization standards to be used for compliance with this chapter, and may also, by regulation, revise the list of requested immunizations.

annotations.annotation: Delegation of Authority pursuant to D.C. Law 3-20, the Immunization of School Students Act of 1979, see Mayor’s Order 2006-117, September 5, 2006 ( 53 DCR 7553).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(d) of Coronavirus Immunization of School Students and Early Childhood Workers Regulation Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-280, Jan. 12, 2022, 69 DCR 000425).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(c) of School Student Vaccination Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-200, July 31, 2023, 70 DCR 10752).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(c) of School Student Vaccination Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-258, Oct. 25, 2023, 70 DCR 14430).
For temporary (225 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(c) of School Student Vaccination Temporary Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Law 25-77, Nov. 28, 2023, 70 DCR 13748).
